statements: DELETE FROM EEG_data WHERE patient_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM eeg_data WHERE id = 100 AND eeg_voltage > 2.5;
DELETE FROM deep_learning_models WHERE model_name = 'RNN' AND model_description LIKE '%Neural%';
DELETE FROM patient_info WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM subject_info WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M';
DELETE FROM eeg_data WHERE subject_id = 101 AND measurement_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM eeg_analysis_results WHERE condition_id = 3 AND subject_id = 201 AND analysis_timestamp > '2023-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM patient_info WHERE age > 50 AND condition = 'Epilepsy';
